datasets.title: Urban Street Scenes 4K
datasets.description: High-resolution footage of city streets, pedestrians, and vehicles from 50+ cities worldwide. Includes full object detection bounding boxes and instance segmentation masks.

faqs.question: What resolution is the Urban Street Scenes dataset?
faqs.answer: The Urban Street Scenes dataset is available in 4K (3840x2160) resolution, with all clips captured at 30fps or higher.

faqs.question: How many cities are included in this dataset?
faqs.answer: This dataset includes footage from over 50 cities across North America, Europe, and Asia, representing diverse urban environments.

datasets.title: Conversational English
datasets.description: Natural multi-turn conversations between native speakers with word-level timestamps, speaker diarization, and emotion annotations.

faqs.question: Does the Conversational English dataset include speaker labels?
faqs.answer: Yes, all conversations include speaker diarization with distinct speaker IDs, turn boundaries, and overlap detection.

datasets.title: Indoor Activities
datasets.description: People performing everyday activities in home and office environments. Includes activity labels, pose estimation, and object interactions.

datasets.title: Instructional Videos
datasets.description: How-to content with synchronized narration, step boundaries, and audio-visual alignment. Perfect for multimodal AI training.

datasets.title: Driving Scenarios
datasets.description: Dashcam footage with road conditions, traffic signs, and vehicle tracking. Includes weather and lighting variations.

datasets.title: Facial Expressions
datasets.description: Diverse faces expressing emotions with consent forms and demographic metadata. Includes landmark detection and emotion labels.

datasets.title: Multilingual Speech
datasets.description: High-quality speech recordings in 50+ languages with transcriptions, translations, and accent labels.

datasets.title: Nature & Wildlife
datasets.description: Landscapes, animals, and natural phenomena captured in various environments. Includes species identification and scene labels.

audio.name: Audio Datasets
audio.description: High-fidelity audio recordings with transcriptions, speaker diarization, and emotion tagging.

video.name: Video Datasets
video.description: Frame-accurate video content with object detection, segmentation, and activity recognition.

multimodal.name: Multimodal Datasets
multimodal.description: Synchronized audio-video pairs with cross-modal annotations and semantic alignment.
